items.name: Runeward
items.feature_text: Infuse a personal trinket as a ward held by you or an ally. The holder can spend a Hope to reduce incoming damage by 1d8; if the ward die is 8, the ward ends after reducing damage and can be recharged on your next rest.

items.name: Unleash Chaos
items.feature_text: At session start, place tokens equal to your Spellcast trait. Make a Spellcast Roll against a far target and spend any number of tokens; on success, roll d10s equal to tokens spent for magic damage. Mark a Stress to replenish tokens; clear unspent tokens at session end.

items.name: Wallwalk
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to let a touched creature walk on walls and ceilings until the scene ends or you cast Wallwalk again.

items.name: Cinder Grasp
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll against a melee target. On success, they take 1d20+3 magic damage and are temporarily On Fire; when they act while On Fire, they take an extra 2d6 magic damage if still burning at the end of their action.

items.name: Floating Eye
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to create a small floating orb you can move within very far range and see through. The spell ends if the orb is damaged or leaves range.

items.name: Counterspell
items.feature_text: Interrupt a magical effect by making a reaction roll using your Spellcast trait. On success, the effect ends, consequences are avoided, and this card is placed in your vault.

items.name: Flight
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll (15). On success, place tokens equal to your Agility (min 1). While flying, spend a token on each action roll; when the last token is spent, you descend.

items.name: Blink Out
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll (12). On success, spend a Hope to teleport to a visible point within far range; spend additional Hope to bring willing creatures within very close range.

items.name: Preservation Blast
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll against all targets within melee range. Targets you succeed against are forced to far range and take d8+3 magic damage using your Spellcast trait.

items.name: Chain Lightning
items.feature_text: Mark 2 Stress to make a Spellcast Roll affecting all targets within close range. Targets you succeed against make a reaction roll vs your Spellcast result; failures take 2d8+4 magic damage. The chain jumps to additional adversaries within close range of affected targets.

items.name: Premonition
items.feature_text: After the GM gives you the consequences of a roll you made, you can undo that move and make another instead.

items.name: Riftwalker
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll (15). On success, place an arcane mark where you stand; the next time you cast Riftwalker successfully, a rift opens to that mark and stays until closed or another spell replaces it. You can drop the spell to place a new mark.

items.name: Telekinesis
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll against a far target. On success, move them anywhere within far range of their original position. You can throw the lifted target at another by making a second Spellcast Roll; on success, deal d12+4 physical damage.

items.name: Arcana-Touched
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Arcana cards are in your loadout, gain +1 to Spellcast Rolls and once per rest you can swap the results of your Hope and Fear Dice.

items.name: Cloaking Blast
items.feature_text: After a successful Spellcast Roll to cast another spell, spend a Hope to become Cloaked. While Cloaked, you remain unseen if stationary when an adversary moves to see you; you lose Cloaked when you move into line of sight or attack.

items.name: Arcane Reflection
items.feature_text: When you would take magic damage, spend any number of Hope to roll that many d6s. If any roll a 6, the attack is reflected back at the caster.

items.name: Confusing Aura
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll (14). On success, create illusory layers around you. Mark any number of Stress to add layers. When attacked, roll a d6 per layer; if any are 5+, one layer breaks and the attack fails; otherwise you take the damage and the spell ends.

items.name: Earthquake
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll (16). On success, all non-flying targets within very far range make a Reaction Roll (18). Failures take 3d10+8 physical damage and are temporarily Vulnerable; successes take half damage. The area becomes difficult terrain and structures may crumble.

items.name: Sensory Projection
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll (15). On success, you perceive a place you've been before as if you were there. The vision ends if you take damage or cast another spell.

items.name: Adjust Reality
items.feature_text: After you or a willing ally makes a roll, spend 5 Hope to change the numeric result to a plausible value of your choice.

items.name: Falling Sky
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll against all adversaries within far range. Mark any number of Stress to rain arcane shards; targets you succeed against take 1d20+2 magic damage per Stress marked.

items.name: Get Back Up
items.feature_text: When you take severe damage, you can mark a Stress to reduce the severity by one threshold.

items.name: Not Good Enough
items.feature_text: When you roll your damage dice, you can reroll any 1s or 2s.

items.name: Whirlwind
items.feature_text: After a successful attack within very close range, spend a Hope to use the attack against all other targets within very close range; additional targets you succeed against take half damage.

items.name: Comrades' Praise
items.feature_text: When you compliment someone or ask about their skill, you both gain 3 Hope.

items.name: Reckless
items.feature_text: Mark a Stress to gain advantage on an attack.

items.name: Scramble
items.feature_text: When a creature within melee range would deal damage to you, you can avoid the attack and safely move out of their melee range.

items.name: Versatile Fighter
items.feature_text: You can use a different trait for an equipped weapon. When you deal damage, you can mark a Stress to use the maximum result of one damage die instead of rolling it.

items.name: Deadly Focus
items.feature_text: Focus on a chosen target; until you attack another creature, defeat the target, or the battle ends, gain +1 Proficiency.

items.name: Fortified Armor
items.feature_text: While wearing armor, gain +2 to your damage thresholds.

items.name: Critical Edge
items.feature_text: When you critically succeed on an attack, you can spend up to 3 Hope; each Hope lets you clear a Hit Point, clear an Armor Slot, or force the target to mark an additional Hit Point (no option twice).

items.name: Vitality
items.feature_text: Permanently gain two benefits: one Stress slot, one Hit Point slot, or +2 to damage thresholds. Place this card in your vault permanently.

items.name: Battle-Hardened
items.feature_text: When you would make a Death Move, spend a Hope to clear a Hit Point instead.

items.name: Rage Up
items.feature_text: Before an attack, mark a Stress to gain a damage bonus equal to twice your Strength. You can Rage Up twice per attack.

items.name: Blade-Touched
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Blade cards are in your loadout, gain +2 to attack rolls and +4 to your severe damage threshold.

items.name: Glancing Blow
items.feature_text: When you fail an attack, you can mark a Stress to deal weapon damage using half your Proficiency.

items.name: Battle Cry
items.feature_text: While charging into danger, rally allies who can hear you: they clear a Stress and gain a Hope, and gain advantage on attack rolls until you or an ally rolls a failure with Fear.

items.name: Frenzy
items.feature_text: Enter a Frenzy until no adversaries are in sight. While Frenzied, you cannot use Armor Slots and gain +10 to damage rolls and +8 to your severe damage threshold.

items.name: Gore and Glory
items.feature_text: When you critically succeed on a weapon attack, gain a Hope or clear a Stress. When you defeat an enemy, gain a Hope or clear a Stress.

items.name: Execution Strike
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to make an attack roll. The GM tells you which targets within range it would hit; choose one and force them to mark 5 Hit Points.

items.name: Battle Monster
items.feature_text: When you successfully attack, you can mark 4 Stress to force the target to mark Hit Points equal to the number of Hit Points you currently have marked instead of rolling damage.

items.name: Onslaught
items.feature_text: When you successfully attack, you never deal damage below a target's major threshold (minimum 2 Hit Points). When a creature within your weapon range damages an ally without including you, you can mark a Stress to force a Reaction Roll (15); on failure, the target marks a Hit Point.

items.name: Deft Maneuvers
items.feature_text: Mark a Stress to sprint anywhere within far range without an Agility roll. If you end in melee range and attack immediately, gain +1 to the attack roll.

items.name: I See It Coming
items.feature_text: When targeted by an attack from beyond melee range, mark a Stress to roll a d4 and add it to your Evasion against the attack.

items.name: Untouchable
items.feature_text: Gain an Evasion bonus equal to half your Agility.

items.name: Ferocity
items.feature_text: When you cause an adversary to mark Hit Points, spend 2 Hope to increase your Evasion by the number of Hit Points they marked until after the next attack against you.

items.name: Strategic Approach
items.feature_text: After a long rest, place tokens equal to your Knowledge (min 1). The first time you move within close range of an adversary and attack, spend a token to gain advantage, clear a Stress on an ally within melee range of that adversary, or add a d8 to your damage roll. Clear tokens on long rest.

items.name: Brace
items.feature_text: When you mark an Armor Slot to reduce incoming damage, you can mark a Stress to mark an additional Armor Slot.

items.name: Tactician
items.feature_text: When you Help an Ally, they can spend a Hope to add one of your Experiences to their roll alongside your advantage die. When making a Tag Team Roll, you can roll a d20 as your Hope Die.

items.name: Boost
items.feature_text: Mark a Stress to vault off a willing ally within close range and make an aerial attack against a far target with advantage; add a d10 to the damage roll and end within melee range of the target.

items.name: Redirect
items.feature_text: When an attack from beyond melee range fails against you, roll d6s equal to your Proficiency. If any are 6, you can mark a Stress to redirect the attack to an adversary within very close range.

items.name: Know Thy Enemy
items.feature_text: Observe a creature and make an Instinct Roll. On success, spend a Hope to ask the GM one set of details: HP/Stress, Difficulty/thresholds, tactics/attack dice, or features/Experiences. You can also mark a Stress to remove a Fear from the GM's pool.

items.name: Signature Move
items.feature_text: Name a signature move. When you perform it as part of an action, you can roll a d20 as your Hope Die; on success, clear a Stress.

items.name: Rapid Riposte
items.feature_text: When an attack against you from within melee range fails, mark a Stress to deal the weapon damage of one of your active weapons to the attacker.

items.name: Recovery
items.feature_text: During a short rest, you can choose a long rest downtime move instead. You can spend a Hope to let an ally do the same.

items.name: Bone-Touched
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Bone cards are in your loadout, gain +1 Agility and once per rest you can spend 3 Hope to make a successful attack against you fail instead.

items.name: Cruel Precision
items.feature_text: When you successfully attack with a weapon, gain a damage bonus equal to your Finesse or Agility.

items.name: Breaking Blow
items.feature_text: When you make a successful attack, you can mark a Stress so the next successful attack against that target deals an extra 2d12 damage.

items.name: Wrangle
items.feature_text: Make an Agility Roll against all targets within close range. Spend a Hope to move targets you succeed against, and willing allies within close range, to another point within close range.

items.name: On the Brink
items.feature_text: When you have 2 or fewer Hit Points unmarked, you do not take Minor damage.

items.name: Splintering Strike
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope and attack all adversaries within your weapon range. On a success against any targets, roll weapon damage and distribute it among those targets; before each target takes damage, roll an additional damage die and add it.

items.name: Deathrun
items.feature_text: Spend 3 Hope to run a straight path to a point within far range, attacking all adversaries within your weapon range along the path. Roll weapon damage with +1 Proficiency for the first target, then remove one damage die for each subsequent target.

items.name: Swiftstep
items.feature_text: When an attack against you fails, clear a Stress; if you cannot, gain a Hope.

items.name: Codex of Force and Frost
items.feature_text: Power Push: Spellcast vs melee target to knock them to far range and deal d10+2 magic damage. Tava's Armor: spend a Hope to give a touched target +1 Armor Score until next rest or recast. Ice Spike: Spellcast (12) to summon a spike within far range; if used as a weapon, deal d6 physical damage on success.

items.name: Codex of Sleep and Mind
items.feature_text: Slumber: Spellcast vs very close target; on success they sleep until damaged or the GM spends Fear. Arcane Barrage: once per rest, spend any Hope to deal d6 magic damage per Hope to a close target. Telepathy: spend a Hope to open mental communication with a visible target until next rest or recast.

items.name: Codex of Flame and Mist
items.feature_text: Wild Flame: Spellcast vs up to three melee adversaries; on success they take 2d6 magic damage and mark a Stress. Magic Hand: conjure a magical hand within far range. Mysterious Mist: Spellcast (13) to create dense fog in a very close area that heavily obscures.

items.name: Codex of Illusions
items.feature_text: Adjust Appearance: magically shift appearance and clothing. Parallela: spend 2 Hope on self or ally within close range so their next attack can hit an additional target their roll would succeed against (only one active at a time). Illusion: Spellcast (14) to create a visual illusion within close range that lasts while you watch it.

items.name: Codex of Seals and Portals
items.feature_text: Runic Lock: Spellcast (15) on a closeable object; once per rest on success, lock it so only chosen creatures can open. Arcane Door: when no adversaries within melee, Spellcast (13) to create a portal to a visible far point; closes after a creature passes. Reveal: Spellcast to reveal anything magically hidden within close range.

items.name: Codex of Runes and Levitation
items.feature_text: Levitation: Spellcast to lift a visible target and move them within close range of their original position. Recant: spend a Hope to force a melee target to make a Reaction Roll (15); on failure they forget the last minute. Rune Circle: mark a Stress to create a circle that deals 2d12+4 magic damage to adversaries in melee range and knocks them to very close range.

items.name: Codex of Tethers and Fire
items.feature_text: Mystic Tether: Spellcast vs a far target; on success they are temporarily Restrained and mark a Stress, grounding flying targets. Fireball: Spellcast vs a very far target; on success, the target and creatures within very close range make a Reaction Roll (13), taking d20+5 magic damage on failure or half on success.

items.name: Codex of Constructs and Warding
items.feature_text: Repudiate: once per rest, make a reaction roll to interrupt a magical effect; on success, it ends. Create Construct: spend a Hope to animate nearby objects into a construct that follows basic commands; Spellcast to command it. It shares your Evasion and traits, deals 2d10+3 physical damage, and falls apart if damaged; only one at a time.

items.name: Codex of Wards and Time
items.feature_text: Arcane Deflection: once per long rest, spend a Hope to negate damage from an attack targeting you or an ally within very close range. Time Lock: freeze an object within far range until your next rest; maintain with Spellcast if moved. Wall of Flame: Spellcast (15) to create a wall of flame between two far points; anything passing through takes 4d10+3 magic damage.

items.name: Manifest Wall
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll (15). On success, spend a Hope to create a magical wall between two far points, up to 50 feet high. Creatures or objects in its path are shunted aside. The wall lasts until your next rest or you cast it again.

items.name: Teleport
items.feature_text: Teleport yourself and willing targets within close range to a place you've been before. Make a Spellcast Roll (16) with a modifier based on your familiarity; on success you arrive as intended, on failure you appear off course.

items.name: Banish
items.feature_text: Spellcast vs a close target; on success roll d20s equal to your Spellcast trait. The target makes a reaction roll against your highest result; on success they mark a Stress, on failure they are banished. When PCs roll with Fear, the difficulty drops by 1 and the target rolls again to return.

items.name: Vengeful Sigil
items.feature_text: Mark a close adversary with a retribution sigil; the GM gains a Fear. When they damage you or allies, place a d8 on this card (up to your level). When you hit the marked adversary, roll those dice and add the total to your damage, then clear the dice. The effect ends when the target is defeated or you recast.

items.name: Codex of Passage
items.feature_text: Pass Through: Spellcast (13); once per rest on success, you and all touching you can pass through a wall or door within close range. Plane Gate: Spellcast (14); once per long rest on success, open a gateway to a known location on another plane until your next rest.

items.name: Codex-Touched
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Codex cards are in your loadout, you can mark a Stress to add your Proficiency to a Spellcast Roll and once per rest replace this card with any card from your vault without paying its Recall Cost.

items.name: Codex of Memory
items.feature_text: Memory Delve: Spellcast vs a far target; on success, ask the GM a question and see memories tied to the answer. Shared Clarity: once per long rest, spend a Hope to link two willing creatures so either can mark Stress for the other until next rest.

items.name: Safe Haven
items.feature_text: With a few minutes of calm, spend 2 Hope to summon a safe interdimensional home. A magical door appears within close range; only chosen creatures can enter, and you can hide the entrance. Resting inside grants an additional downtime move; the doorway must be resummoned after you leave.

items.name: Codex of Transformation
items.feature_text: Transform: Spellcast (15) to become an inanimate object up to twice your size until you take damage. Eternal Enervation: once per long rest, Spellcast vs a close target; on success they become permanently Vulnerable.

items.name: Disintegration Wave
items.feature_text: Make a Spellcast Roll (18). On success, the GM tells you which adversaries within far range have Difficulty 18 or lower. Mark a Stress for each you choose; they are killed and cannot be brought back.

items.name: Codex of Timebreak
items.feature_text: Timejammer: Spellcast (18) to halt time for everyone within far range except you; it resumes after your next action targeting another creature. Magic Immunity: spend 5 Hope to become immune to magic damage until your next rest.

items.name: Transcendent Union
items.feature_text: Spend 5 Hope to link two or more willing creatures until your next rest. When any linked creature would mark Stress or Hit Points, the group chooses who marks it.

items.name: Deft Deceiver
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to gain advantage on a roll to deceive or trick someone into believing a lie.

items.name: Enrapture
items.feature_text: Spellcast vs a close target; on success they become temporarily Enraptured, focusing only on you. Once per rest on a success, you can mark a Stress to force the Enraptured target to mark a Stress.

items.name: Inspirational Words
items.feature_text: After a long rest, place tokens equal to your Presence. When you speak with an ally, spend a token to let them clear a Stress, clear a Hit Point, or gain a Hope. Clear unspent tokens on a long rest.

items.name: Tell No Lies
items.feature_text: Spellcast vs a very close target; on success they cannot lie while within close range. If they refuse to answer a question, they mark a Stress and the effect ends.

items.name: Troublemaker
items.feature_text: Taunt a far target and make a Presence Roll. On success, roll d4s equal to your Proficiency; the target marks Stress equal to the highest result.

items.name: Hypnotic Shimmer
items.feature_text: Spellcast against all adversaries in front of you within close range. On success, they mark a Stress and are temporarily Stunned, unable to act or react until they clear the condition.

items.name: Invisibility
items.feature_text: Spellcast (10). On success, mark a Stress to make yourself or an ally within melee range Invisible. Place tokens equal to your Spellcast trait; spend a token each time the Invisible creature takes an action. The effect ends when the last token is spent; only one creature can be Invisible at a time.

items.name: Soothing Speech
items.feature_text: During a short rest, when you use Tend to Wounds on another character, they clear one additional Hit Point and you clear 2 Hit Points.

items.name: Through Your Eyes
items.feature_text: Choose a target within very far range; you can see and hear through them until you cast another spell or take your next rest.

items.name: Thought Delver
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to read a far target's surface thoughts. Make a Spellcast Roll against them to delve deeper; on a roll with Fear, they may realize you're reading their thoughts.

items.name: Words of Discord
items.feature_text: Whisper discord to a melee adversary and Spellcast (13). On success, they mark a Stress and must attack another adversary instead. The next time you cast this on them, you take a -5 penalty to the Spellcast Roll.

items.name: Never Upstaged
items.feature_text: When you mark Hit Points from an attack, you can mark a Stress to place tokens equal to the Hit Points marked. On your next successful attack, gain +5 damage per token and then clear the tokens.

items.name: Share the Burden
items.feature_text: Take on Stress from a willing creature within melee range. Transfer any number of their marked Stress to you and gain a Hope for each transferred Stress.

items.name: Endless Charisma
items.feature_text: After you make an action roll to persuade, lie, or gain favor, spend a Hope to reroll your Hope or Fear Die.

items.name: Grace-Touched
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Grace cards are in your loadout, you can mark an Armor Slot instead of Stress, and when you would force a target to mark Hit Points you can instead force them to mark that much Stress.

items.name: Astral Projection
items.feature_text: Mark a Stress to create a projected copy of yourself at a place you've been before. You can see and hear through it and act as if you were there; it lasts until your next rest or it takes damage.

items.name: Mass Enrapture
items.feature_text: Spellcast against all targets within far range. Targets you succeed against become temporarily Enraptured. You can mark a Stress to force all Enraptured targets to mark a Stress, ending the spell.

items.name: Copycat
items.feature_text: Mimic a domain card of level 8 or lower from another player's loadout. Spend Hope equal to half the card's level to gain its feature until your next rest or they vault the card.

items.name: Master of the Craft
items.feature_text: Permanently gain +2 to two Experiences or +3 to one Experience. Place this card in your vault permanently.

items.name: Encore
items.feature_text: When an ally within close range deals damage to an adversary, make a Spellcast Roll against that target. On success, you deal the same damage; on success with Fear, place this card in your vault.

items.name: Notorious
items.feature_text: Leverage your notoriety: mark a Stress before a roll to gain +10 to the result. Food and drink are free; other purchases cost one bag of gold less (min one handful). This card does not count against your loadout and cannot be vaulted.

items.name: Pick and Pull
items.feature_text: Gain advantage on action rolls to pick nonmagical locks, disarm nonmagical traps, or steal items from a target.

items.name: Blade Storm
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to make a Spellcast Roll and conjure throwing blades at all targets within very close range. Targets you succeed against take d8+2 magic damage; Vulnerable targets take an extra 1d8 damage.

items.name: Uncanny Disguise
items.feature_text: With a few minutes to prepare, mark a Stress to disguise yourself as a humanoid you can picture. Gain advantage on Presence rolls to avoid scrutiny. Place tokens equal to your Spellcast trait; spend a token on each action while disguised.

items.name: Midnight Spirit
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to summon a humanoid-sized spirit until your next rest. You can command it with Spellcast; it can attack a far target, moving to melee range and dealing d6s of magic damage equal to your Spellcast trait before dissipating. Only one spirit at a time.

items.name: Shadowbind
items.feature_text: Spellcast against all adversaries within very close range; targets you succeed against are temporarily Restrained.

items.name: Chokehold
items.feature_text: When behind a creature your size, mark a Stress to put them in a chokehold, making them temporarily Vulnerable. Attacks against them while Vulnerable deal an extra 2d6 damage.

items.name: Veil of Night
items.feature_text: Spellcast (13) to create a curtain of darkness between two far points. Only you can see through it; you are Hidden to adversaries on the other side and gain advantage on attacks through the veil.

items.name: Stealth Expertise
items.feature_text: When you roll with Fear while moving unnoticed through danger, you can mark a Stress to roll with Hope instead. If an ally within close range rolls with Fear, you can mark a Stress to change their result to Hope.

items.name: Glyph of Nightfall
items.feature_text: Spellcast vs a very close target. On success, spend a Hope to mark them with a dark glyph that reduces their Difficulty by your Knowledge (min 1) temporarily.

items.name: Hush
items.feature_text: Spellcast vs a close target. On success, spend a Hope to create a silencing field that follows them within very close range. The field ends when the GM spends a Fear, you recast, or you take major damage; while Silenced, targets cannot make noise or cast spells.

items.name: Phantom Retreat
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to mark your current position. Before your next rest, spend another Hope to vanish and reappear at the marked point, ending the spell.

items.name: Dark Whispers
items.feature_text: You can speak into the mind of anyone you've touched. You can mark a Stress to Spellcast against them; on success, ask the GM one question about their location, actions, fears, or what they cherish most.

items.name: Mass Disguise
items.feature_text: With a few minutes of silence, mark a Stress to disguise all willing creatures within close range. Forms share a general size and structure. Disguised creatures gain advantage on Presence rolls to avoid scrutiny. Activate a Countdown (8); when it triggers, the disguise drops.

items.name: Midnight-Touched
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Midnight cards are in your loadout, once per rest when you have 0 Hope and the GM would gain a Fear, you can gain a Hope instead; when you hit, you can mark a Stress to add your Fear Die result to your damage roll.

items.name: Vanishing Dodge
items.feature_text: When a physical attack against you fails, spend a Hope to become Hidden and teleport to a point within close range of the attacker. You remain Hidden until your next action roll.

items.name: Shadowhunter
items.feature_text: While in low light or darkness, gain +1 Evasion and make attack rolls with advantage.

items.name: Spellcharge
items.feature_text: When you take magic damage, place tokens equal to Hit Points marked (up to your Spellcast trait). When you hit a target, spend any number of tokens to add a d6 per token to the damage roll.

items.name: Night Terror
items.feature_text: Targets within very close range must make a Reaction Roll (16) or become Horrified and Vulnerable. Steal Fear from the GM equal to the number of Horrified targets, roll that many d6s, and deal that total damage to each Horrified target.

items.name: Twilight Toll
items.feature_text: Choose a far target. Each time you succeed on a non-damage action roll against them, place a token. When you deal damage to that target, spend tokens to add a d12 per token to the damage roll. Clear tokens when you choose a new target or take a rest.

items.name: Eclipse
items.feature_text: Spellcast (16). On success, plunge the area within far range into darkness only you and your allies can see through. Attacks against you or allies in the shadow have disadvantage. When you or an ally succeeds with Hope in the shadow, the target marks a Stress. The effect ends when the GM spends a Fear or you take severe damage.

items.name: Specter of the Dark
items.feature_text: Mark a Stress to become Spectral until you make an action roll targeting another creature. While Spectral, you are immune to physical damage and can pass through solid objects.

items.name: Gifted Tracker
items.feature_text: When tracking a creature or group by their signs, spend any number of Hope to ask that many questions about their direction, timing, actions, or count. When you meet tracked creatures, gain +1 Evasion against them.

items.name: Wild Speech
items.feature_text: Speak with plants and animals by making an Instinct Roll (12). On success they share what they know; on a roll with Fear, information may be limited or costly. Before a Spellcast Roll in a natural environment, you can spend a Hope for +2 to the roll.

items.name: Vicious Entangle
items.feature_text: Spellcast vs a far target; on success, deal 1d8+1 physical damage and temporarily Restrain them. You can spend a Hope to also Restrain another adversary within very close range of the target.

items.name: Conjure Swarm
items.feature_text: Choose a swarm: Tekaira Armored Beetles (mark a Stress; next damage you take is reduced by one threshold, and you can spend a Hope to keep them after taking damage) or Fire Flies (Spellcast vs all adversaries within close range; spend a Hope to deal 2d8+3 magic damage to targets you succeeded against).

items.name: Natural Familiar
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to summon a small nature spirit or critter until next rest, recast, or it is attacked. Spend another Hope to give it flight. Spellcast to command tasks and mark a Stress to see through its eyes. When you damage an adversary in melee range of your familiar, add a d6 to your damage roll.

items.name: Corrosive Projectile
items.feature_text: Spellcast vs a far target; on success, deal d6+4 magic damage. Mark 2 or more Stress to make them permanently Corroded; while Corroded, they take a -1 Difficulty penalty per 2 Stress spent (stacks).

items.name: Towering Stalk
items.feature_text: Conjure a climbable stalk within close range that can grow up to far range high. You can mark a Stress to use it as an attack: Spellcast against adversaries within close range; on success, lift and drop them for d8 physical damage.

items.name: Death Grip
items.feature_text: Spellcast vs a close target. On success, choose one: pull them to melee or pull yourself to them; force them to mark 2 Stress; or strike all adversaries between you and the target for 3d6+2 physical damage on a failed Reaction Roll (13). The target is temporarily Restrained.

items.name: Healing Field
items.feature_text: Conjure a healing field within close range; you and allies in the area clear 1 Hit Point. Spend 2 Hope to clear 2 Hit Points instead.

items.name: Thorn Skin
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to sprout thorns and place tokens equal to your Spellcast trait. When you take damage, spend any number of tokens to roll that many d6s and reduce incoming damage by the total; if in melee range of the attacker, deal that much damage back. Clear tokens on rest.

items.name: Wild Fortress
items.feature_text: Spellcast (13). On success, spend 2 Hope to grow a dome-shaped barricade that you and one ally can shelter within. Creatures inside cannot be targeted or attack; attacks against the dome automatically succeed. The dome has thresholds 15/30 and lasts until it marks 3 Hit Points.

items.name: Conjured Steeds
items.feature_text: Spend any number of Hope to conjure that many magical steeds until your next long rest or they take damage. Steeds double travel speed and allow far-range movement without rolls, but riders take -2 to attack rolls and +2 to damage rolls.

items.name: Forager
items.feature_text: Gain a downtime move to forage. Roll a d6 to find a consumable: unique food (clear 2 Stress), beautiful relic (gain 2 Hope), arcane rune (+2 Spellcast Roll), healing vial (clear 2 Hit Points), luck charm (reroll any die), or choose one. The party can carry up to five foraged consumables.

items.name: Sage-Touched
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Sage cards are in your loadout, gain +2 to Spellcast Rolls while in a natural environment and once per rest you can double your Agility or Instinct for a roll (declare before rolling).

items.name: Wild Surge
items.feature_text: Mark a Stress to awaken wild power and place a Wild Surge Die (d6) set to 1. Add its value to every action roll; after each use, increase it by 1. When it would exceed 6 or you rest, the form ends and you mark an additional Stress.

items.name: Forest Sprites
items.feature_text: Spellcast (13). On success, spend any number of Hope to create that many sprites within far range. Allies gain +3 to attack rolls against adversaries within melee range of a sprite; allies within melee range of a sprite can mark an additional Armor Slot when they mark one. Sprites vanish after granting a benefit or taking damage.

items.name: Rejuvenation Barrier
items.feature_text: Spellcast (15). On success, create a protective barrier at very close range around you. You and allies within clear 1d4 Hit Points. While the barrier is up, you and allies within resist physical damage from outside; it moves with you.

items.name: Fane of the Wilds
items.feature_text: After a long rest, place tokens equal to the number of Sage cards in your loadout and vault. After you make a Spellcast Roll, spend any number of tokens to gain +1 per token. When you critically succeed on a Sage Spellcast Roll, gain a token. Clear tokens on long rest.

items.name: Plant Dominion
items.feature_text: Spellcast (18). On success, reshape plant life within far range (grow trees, clear paths, or form walls of roots).

items.name: Force of Nature
items.feature_text: Mark a Stress to transform into a hulking nature spirit. Gain +10 damage when you succeed on attacks or Spellcast Rolls, clear an Armor Slot when you defeat a creature within close range, and cannot be Restrained. Before each action roll, spend a Hope or revert.

items.name: Tempest
items.feature_text: Choose a tempest and Spellcast against all targets within far range; on success, effects last until the GM spends a Fear. Blizzard: 2d20+8 magic damage and targets are temporarily Vulnerable. Hurricane: 3d10+10 magic damage and targets cannot move against the wind. Sandstorm: 5d6+9 magic damage and attacks from beyond melee range have disadvantage.

items.name: Bolt Beacon
items.feature_text: Spellcast vs a far target; on success, spend a Hope to deal d8+2 magic damage. The target becomes temporarily Vulnerable and glows until the condition ends.

items.name: Mending Touch
items.feature_text: With a few minutes of focus, spend 2 Hope to clear 1 Hit Point or 1 Stress on a creature. Once per long rest, if you learn something new about them or reveal something about yourself during the healing, clear 2 Hit Points or 2 Stress instead.

items.name: Reassurance
items.feature_text: After an ally makes an action roll but before consequences, you can offer support; they reroll their dice.

items.name: Final Words
items.feature_text: Spellcast (13) to speak with a corpse. On success with Hope, it answers up to three questions; on success with Fear, it answers one. The corpse answers truthfully, then turns to dust.

items.name: Healing Hands
items.feature_text: Spellcast (13) and target a creature within melee range other than yourself. On success, mark a Stress to clear 2 Hit Points or 2 Stress; on failure, mark a Stress to clear 1 Hit Point or 1 Stress. You cannot heal the same target again until your next long rest.

items.name: Second Wind
items.feature_text: When you succeed on an attack, clear 3 Stress or 1 Hit Point. On a success with Hope, you also clear 3 Stress or 1 Hit Point on an ally within close range.

items.name: Voice of Reason
items.feature_text: Gain advantage on action rolls to de-escalate violence or convince someone to follow your lead. When all Stress slots are marked, you gain +1 Proficiency for damage rolls.

items.name: Divination
items.feature_text: Spend 3 Hope to ask one yes-or-no question about the near future and receive the answer in a brief vision.

items.name: Lifeward
items.feature_text: Spend 3 Hope and choose an ally within close range. When they would make a Death Move, they clear a Hit Point instead. The effect ends after saving them, when you cast Lifeward on another target, or after a long rest.

items.name: Shape Material
items.feature_text: Spend a Hope to shape natural material you are touching (stone, ice, wood) within close range into a simple tool or structure.

items.name: Smite
items.feature_text: Spend 3 Hope to charge a smite. The next time you hit with a weapon, double the damage roll; it deals magic damage regardless of weapon type.

items.name: Restoration
items.feature_text: After a long rest, place tokens equal to your Spellcast trait. Touch a creature and spend tokens to clear 2 Hit Points or 2 Stress per token; you can also spend a token to clear Vulnerable or heal an ailment. Clear unspent tokens on a long rest.

items.name: Zone of Protection
items.feature_text: Spellcast (16). On success, create a zone at a far point for allies within very close range. Place a d6 set to 1; when an ally in the zone takes damage, reduce it by the die's value and increase the die by 1. When it would exceed 6, the effect ends.

items.name: Healing Strike
items.feature_text: When you deal damage to an adversary, you can spend 2 Hope to clear a Hit Point on an ally within close range.

items.name: Splendor-Touched
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Splendor cards are in your loadout, gain +3 to your severe damage threshold and once per long rest you can choose to mark Stress or spend Hope instead of marking Hit Points.

items.name: Shield Aura
items.feature_text: Mark a Stress to cast a protective aura on a creature within very close range. When they mark an Armor Slot, reduce the severity by an additional threshold. If the aura prevents all Hit Point damage from an attack, the effect ends. Only one creature can have Shield Aura at a time.

items.name: Stunning Sunlight
items.feature_text: Spellcast to unleash rays against all adversaries in front of you within far range. On success, spend any number of Hope to force that many targets to make a Reaction Roll (14). Success: 3d20+3 magic damage; failure: 4d20+5 magic damage and temporarily Stunned.

items.name: Overwhelming Aura
items.feature_text: Spellcast (15). On success, spend 2 Hope to set your Presence equal to your Spellcast trait until your next long rest. While active, an adversary must mark a Stress when they target you with an attack.

items.name: Salvation Beam
items.feature_text: Spellcast (16). On success, mark any number of Stress to target a line of allies within far range. Clear Hit Points equal to Stress marked, divided among them as you choose.

items.name: Invigoration
items.feature_text: When you or an ally within close range uses a feature with an exhaustion limit, spend any number of Hope and roll that many d6s. If any roll a 6, the feature can be used again.

items.name: Resurrection
items.feature_text: Spellcast (20) to restore a creature dead no longer than 100 years to full strength. Then roll a d6; on 5 or lower, place this card in your vault permanently. On failure, you cannot cast Resurrection for a week.

items.name: Bare Bones
items.feature_text: When you choose not to equip armor, your base Armor Score becomes 3 + Strength and your base thresholds are Tier 1: 9/19, Tier 2: 11/24, Tier 3: 13/31, Tier 4: 15/38.

items.name: Forceful Push
items.feature_text: Make a primary weapon attack against a melee target. On success, deal damage and knock them to close range; on success with Hope, add a d6 to damage. You can spend a Hope to make them temporarily Vulnerable.

items.name: I Am Your Shield
items.feature_text: When an ally within very close range would take damage, mark a Stress to become the target instead. When you take damage from this attack, you can mark any number of Armor Slots.

items.name: Body Basher
items.feature_text: On a successful attack with a melee weapon, gain a damage bonus equal to your Strength.

items.name: Bold Presence
items.feature_text: When you make a Presence Roll, you can spend a Hope to add your Strength to the roll. Once per rest, when you would gain a condition, describe how your bold presence helps and avoid the condition.

items.name: Critical Inspiration
items.feature_text: When you critically succeed on an attack, all allies within very close range can clear a Stress or gain a Hope.

items.name: Lean on Me
items.feature_text: When you console or inspire an ally who failed an action roll, you both clear 2 Stress.

items.name: Goad Them On
items.feature_text: Taunt a target within close range and make a Presence Roll. On success, they mark a Stress and the next time the GM spotlights them they must target you with an attack made with disadvantage.

items.name: Support Tank
items.feature_text: When an ally within close range fails a roll, spend 2 Hope to let them reroll their Hope or Fear Die.

items.name: Armorer
items.feature_text: While wearing armor, gain +1 Armor Score. During a rest, when you repair your armor as a downtime move, your allies also clear an Armor Slot.

items.name: Rousing Strike
items.feature_text: When you critically succeed on an attack, you and allies who can see or hear you clear a Hit Point or 1d4 Stress.

items.name: Inevitable
items.feature_text: When you fail an action roll, your next action roll has advantage.

items.name: Rise Up
items.feature_text: Gain a bonus to your severe threshold equal to your Proficiency. When you mark Hit Points from an attack, clear a Stress.

items.name: Shrug It Off
items.feature_text: When you would take damage, you can mark a Stress to reduce its severity by one threshold. Then roll a d6; on 3 or lower, place this card in your vault.

items.name: Valor-Touched
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Valor cards are in your loadout, gain +1 Armor Score and when you mark Hit Points without marking an Armor Slot, clear an Armor Slot.

items.name: Full Surge
items.feature_text: Mark 3 Stress to gain +2 to all character traits until your next rest.

items.name: Ground Pound
items.feature_text: Spend 2 Hope to make a Strength Roll against all targets within very close range. Targets you succeed against are thrown to far range and make a Reaction Roll (17); failures take 4d10+8 damage and successes take half.

items.name: Hold the Line
items.feature_text: Describe your defensive stance and spend a Hope. If an adversary moves within very close range, they are pulled into melee range and Restrained until you move, fail with Fear, or the GM spends 2 Fear to clear the condition.

items.name: Lead by Example
items.feature_text: When you deal damage to an adversary, mark a Stress to encourage allies. The next PC to attack that adversary can clear a Stress or gain a Hope.

items.name: Unbreakable
items.feature_text: When you mark your last Hit Point, instead of making a Death Move, roll a d6 and clear that many Hit Points, then place this card in your vault.

items.name: Unyielding Armor
items.feature_text: When you would mark an Armor Slot, roll d6s equal to your Proficiency. If any roll a 6, reduce the severity by one threshold without marking an Armor Slot.
